013package org.apache.juneau.bean.html5;
014
015import java.net.*;
016
017import org.apache.juneau.*;
018import org.apache.juneau.annotation.*;
019import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
020
021/**
022 * DTO for an HTML <a class="doclink" href="https://www.w3.org/TR/html5/forms.html#the-form-element">&lt;form&gt;</a>
023 * element.
024 *
025 * <p>
026 * The form element represents a document section containing interactive controls for submitting
027 * information to a web server. It groups form controls together and defines how the data should
028 * be submitted, including the target URL, HTTP method, and encoding type.
029 *
030 * <h5 class='section'>Examples:</h5>
031 * <p class='bcode w800'>
032 *    <jc>// Simple contact form</jc>
033 *    Form <jv>form1</jv> = <jsm>form</jsm>()
034 *       .action(<js>"/contact"</js>)
035 *       .method(<js>"post"</js>)
036 *       .children(
037 *          <jsm>input</jsm>(<js>"text"</js>).name(<js>"name"</js>).placeholder(<js>"Your Name"</js>),
038 *          <jsm>input</jsm>(<js>"email"</js>).name(<js>"email"</js>).placeholder(<js>"Your Email"</js>),
039 *          <jsm>textarea</jsm>().name(<js>"message"</js>).placeholder(<js>"Your Message"</js>),
040 *          <jsm>button</jsm>().type(<js>"submit"</js>).text(<js>"Send Message"</js>)
041 *       );
042 * 
043 *    <jc>// File upload form</jc>
044 *    Form <jv>form2</jv> = <jsm>form</jsm>()
045 *       .action(<js>"/upload"</js>)
046 *       .method(<js>"post"</js>)
047 *       .enctype(<js>"multipart/form-data"</js>)
048 *       .children(
049 *          <jsm>input</jsm>(<js>"file"</js>).name(<js>"file"</js>).accept(<js>"image/*"</js>),
050 *          <jsm>button</jsm>().type(<js>"submit"</js>).text(<js>"Upload"</js>)
051 *       );
052 * 
053 *    <jc>// Form with validation</jc>
054 *    Form <jv>form3</jv> = <jsm>form</jsm>()
055 *       .action(<js>"/register"</js>)
056 *       .method(<js>"post"</js>)
057 *       .novalidate(<jk>false</jk>)
058 *       .children(
059 *          <jsm>input</jsm>(<js>"email"</js>).name(<js>"email"</js>).required(<jk>true</jk>),
060 *          <jsm>input</jsm>(<js>"password"</js>).name(<js>"password"</js>).required(<jk>true</jk>),
061 *          <jsm>button</jsm>().type(<js>"submit"</js>).text(<js>"Register"</js>)
062 *       );
063 * </p>
064 *
065 * <p>
066 * The following convenience methods are provided for constructing instances of this bean:
067 * <ul class='javatree'>
068 *    <li class='jc'>{@link HtmlBuilder}
069 *    <ul class='javatree'>
070 *       <li class='jm'>{@link HtmlBuilder#form() form()}
071 *       <li class='jm'>{@link HtmlBuilder#form(Object, Object...) form(Object, Object...)}
072 *    </ul>
073 * </ul>
074 * </p>
075 *
076 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
077 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/JuneauBeanHtml5">juneau-bean-html5</a>
078 * </ul>
079 */
080@Bean(typeName="form")
081@FluentSetters
082public class Form extends HtmlElementMixed {
083
084   /**
085    * Creates an empty {@link Form} element.
086    */
087   public Form() {}
088
089   /**
090    * Creates a {@link Form} element with the specified {@link Form#action(String)} attribute.
091    *
092    * @param action The {@link Form#action(String)} attribute.
093    */
094   public Form(String action) {
095      action(action);
096   }
097
098   /**
099    * Creates an {@link Form} element with the specified {@link Form#action(String)} attribute and child nodes.
100    *
101    * @param action The {@link Form#action(String)} attribute.
102    * @param children The child nodes.
103    */
104   public Form(String action, Object...children) {
105      action(action).children(children);
106   }
107
108   /**
109    * <a class="doclink" href="https://www.w3.org/TR/html5/forms.html#attr-form-accept-charset">accept-charset</a>
110    * attribute.
111    *
112    * <p>
113    * Specifies the character encodings that are accepted for form submission. Multiple encodings
114    * can be specified as a space-separated list.
115    *
116    * <p>
117    * Common values:
118    * <ul>
119    *    <li><js>"UTF-8"</js> - Unicode UTF-8 encoding (default)</li>
120    *    <li><js>"ISO-8859-1"</js> - Latin-1 encoding</li>
121    *    <li><js>"UTF-8 ISO-8859-1"</js> - Multiple encodings</li>
122    * </ul>
123    *
124    * @param acceptcharset The character encodings accepted for form submission.
125    * @return This object.
126    */
127   public Form acceptcharset(String value) {
128      attr("accept-charset", value);
129      return this;
130   }
131
132   /**
133    * <a class="doclink" href="https://www.w3.org/TR/html5/forms.html#attr-fs-action">action</a> attribute.
134    *
135    * <p>
136    * URL to use for form submission.
137    *
138    * <p>
139    * The value can be of any of the following types: {@link URI}, {@link URL}, {@link String}.
140    * Strings must be valid URIs.
141    *
142    * <p>
143    * URIs defined by {@link UriResolver} can be used for values.
144    *
145    * @param action The new value for this attribute.
146    * @return This object.
147    */
148   public Form action(String value) {
149      attrUri("action", value);
150      return this;
151   }
152
153   /**
154    * <a class="doclink" href="https://www.w3.org/TR/html5/forms.html#attr-form-autocomplete">autocomplete</a>
155    * attribute.
156    *
157    * <p>
158    * Sets the default autocomplete behavior for all form controls within this form.
159    * Individual controls can override this setting.
160    *
161    * <p>
162    * Possible values:
163    * <ul>
164    *    <li><js>"on"</js> - Allow autocomplete (default)</li>
165    *    <li><js>"off"</js> - Disable autocomplete</li>
166    * </ul>
167    *
168    * @param autocomplete The default autocomplete behavior for form controls.
169    * @return This object.
170    */
171   public Form autocomplete(String value) {
172      attr("autocomplete", value);
173      return this;
174   }
175
176   /**
177    * <a class="doclink" href="https://www.w3.org/TR/html5/forms.html#attr-fs-enctype">enctype</a> attribute.
178    *
179    * <p>
180    * Specifies how form data should be encoded when submitted to the server.
181    *
182    * <p>
183    * Possible values:
184    * <ul>
185    *    <li><js>"application/x-www-form-urlencoded"</js> - Default encoding (default)</li>
186    *    <li><js>"multipart/form-data"</js> - Used for file uploads</li>
187    *    <li><js>"text/plain"</js> - Plain text encoding</li>
188    * </ul>
189    *
190    * @param enctype The encoding type for form data submission.
191    * @return This object.
192    */
193   public Form enctype(String value) {
194      attr("enctype", value);
195      return this;
196   }
197
198   /**
199    * <a class="doclink" href="https://www.w3.org/TR/html5/forms.html#attr-fs-method">method</a> attribute.
200    *
201    * <p>
202    * Specifies the HTTP method to use when submitting the form.
203    *
204    * <p>
205    * Possible values:
206    * <ul>
207    *    <li><js>"get"</js> - Form data is sent as URL parameters (default)</li>
208    *    <li><js>"post"</js> - Form data is sent in the request body</li>
209    *    <li><js>"dialog"</js> - Used for forms within dialog elements</li>
210    * </ul>
211    *
212    * @param method The HTTP method for form submission.
213    * @return This object.
214    */
215   public Form method(String value) {
216      attr("method", value);
217      return this;
218   }
219
220   /**
221    * <a class="doclink" href="https://www.w3.org/TR/html5/forms.html#attr-form-name">name</a> attribute.
222    *
223    * <p>
224    * Specifies the name of the form. This name can be used to access the form via the
225    * document.forms API and for form submission.
226    *
227    * <p>
228    * The name should be unique within the document and should not contain spaces or special characters.
229    *
230    * @param name The name of the form for API access and submission.
231    * @return This object.
232    */
233   public Form name(String value) {
234      attr("name", value);
235      return this;
236   }
237
238   /**
239    * <a class="doclink" href="https://www.w3.org/TR/html5/forms.html#attr-fs-novalidate">novalidate</a> attribute.
240    *
241    * <p>
242    * Disables form validation, allowing the form to be submitted even if validation fails.
243    *
244    * @param novalidate If <jk>true</jk>, disables form validation.
245    * @return This object.
246    */
247   public Form novalidate(Boolean value) {
248      attr("novalidate", value);
249      return this;
250   }
251
252   /**
253    * <a class="doclink" href="https://www.w3.org/TR/html5/forms.html#attr-fs-target">target</a> attribute.
254    *
255    * <p>
256    * Specifies where to display the response after form submission.
257    *
258    * <p>
259    * Possible values:
260    * <ul>
261    *    <li><js>"_self"</js> - Load in the same frame (default)</li>
262    *    <li><js>"_blank"</js> - Load in a new window or tab</li>
263    *    <li><js>"_parent"</js> - Load in the parent frame</li>
264    *    <li><js>"_top"</js> - Load in the full body of the window</li>
265    *    <li>Frame name - Load in the named frame</li>
266    * </ul>
267    *
268    * @param target Where to display the form submission response.
269    * @return This object.
270    */
271   public Form target(String value) {
272      attr("target", value);
273      return this;
274   }
275
276   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
277   // Overridden methods
278   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
